message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe is worth a significant investment. While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product just yet, I assure you it holds immense value. I'm confident that its potential will far exceed your expectations. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This price reflects the potential I see in this product and its market value. I believe this is a fair offer, considering the product's worth. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
